item.title: T.B.M. Lilies of the Valley Floral and Variety Store Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

T.B.M. Lilies of the Valley offers exquisite floral arrangements, delightful fruit baskets, and a variety of unique gift items. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, we provide personalized services for all occasions.

Our Services

  • Floral Arrangements: Custom designs for any occasion
  • Fruit Baskets: Beautifully arranged gift baskets
  • Gift Items: Unique selection of specialty gifts

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Renelle Maitland / Theresa Maitland
  • Phone: 794-7525 / 345-4141
  • Social Media: Follow us on Facebook
